alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:05AM CDT until April 20 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN DICKINSON...OTTAWA...EASTERN REPUBLIC...CLAY... WASHINGTON AND CLOUD COUNTIES... At 205 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Agenda to near Idana to 4 miles west of Talmage, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 60 mph winds in Clyde. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Concordia, Clay Center, Minneapolis, Belleville, Washington, Wakefield, Clyde, Bennington, Clifton, Miltonvale, Linn, Delphos, Greenleaf, Tescott, Morganville, Cuba, Morrowville, Green, Culver and Wells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Republic; Washington
